name: Coldline Lapland (TTG)
description:
You've had enough of all the annoying things at Christmas like carolers knocking on your door and annoying you with their poor renditions of jingle bells and the Christmas lights that somehow tangle themselves into impossible shapes. So you've equipped yourself with grandads trusty mince pie shotgun and you're going to bring the fight to them. Your going to give them a Christmas they wont forget...

(Carolers, Lights, Mince Pies)
